repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: The Nāṟkaraṇavupatēcam, "Teaching on the four karaṇams", which appears to be a lesson on the four karaṇams, that is, the four organs of perceptions.

collation.desc: 9 folios = Nāṟkaraṇavupatēcam. Tamil foliation {1}‒9. f9v blank.

additions.desc: Marginal and in-text benedictions; marginal title; nūl varalāṟu; text completion statement.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Composite manuscript dated to circa 1840 by Vinson (1866-1867, 1867, 1867-1868) and to 1840 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, Département des Manuscrits, Inventaire 7 = dons : manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, n° 1 à 3306: no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 2, no. 4.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.

Vinson, Julien. 1866-1867. Catalogue tamoul. Handwritten descriptions of BnF manuscripts “Tamoul 4-496” (new shelfmark “Indien 4-496”). BnF Indien 1061 (nos. 4-132), BnF Indien 1062 (nos. 133-204), BnF Indien 577 (nos. 205-496). — See BnF Indien 1061, f. 2r. Only the end of the description is available since f1r is missing in BnF Indien 1061.

Vinson, Julien. 1867. Manuscrits tamouls. BnF 4-IMPR OR-77 (B). — Proof-readings (f1-f49) of the descriptions of BnF manuscripts “Tamoul 1-204” (new shelfmark “Indien 1-204”). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. — See f. 1r, no. 4.

Vinson, Julien. 1867-1868. Manuscrits tamouls. BnF Indien 577, f1-f49. — Corrected 2nd proof-readings (f1-f30) and 1st proof-readings (f31-f49) of the descriptions of BnF manuscripts “Tamoul 1-204” (new shelfmark “Indien 1-204”). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. — See f. 1r, no. 4.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings between separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
